item.description:
Posted on Behalf of Maple Farm Sanctuary. 

If you go to the menu bar under More and then Files...you can see the invite flier.

 

Come one! Come ALL!!!


Maple Farm Sanctuary is hosting a FARM FEST!!

We are THRILLED to introduce you to some of our MANY lovable animal residents while giving you tours of the happy farm.

The place where rescued animals live out their lives in peace.

-Meet our NEWEST addition to the MFS family, Bentley!
Kids love him because he is the silliest baby goat!

-Come check out Max in his brand new barn!

We will have an array of super fun activities like kid's crafts, face painting, raffles, yoga, massage, reiki and MORE!!!

Live music by: Brief Awakening & Tiffany Gassett!

This FREE event is sponsered by ~Yoga at The Ashram~

Catering provided by Whole Foods Bellingham.

All you need to bring is your great, positive energy and a willingness to have a blast!

Hope you can join us!
item.name: Farm Fest at Maple Farm Sanctuary
